page.title: 18 A DAY AT PLUME SCHOOL
page.content: I get to school by the Eastern National bus and because I live within 3 miles of the school my bus fare is 30 pence each day- 15 pence each way. I arrive at school at about 9 a.m. which is just right because school commences at 9.05. Then our form teacher,Mrs. Neale, comes to take the register before we go to our first lesson. After the sixth lesson ends at 1.10 p.m.we line up outside the stage hall where we buy our dinner. Sixty pence is about enough to buy a dinner. If you want you can bring sandwiches to school and eat them in an outside classroom set aside for that purpose. There is a tuckshop where you can buy crisps and sweets at break and lunchtime. At 2.o5 there is afternoon registration,Assembly and 2 more lessons before we go home. Megan Jones
